divs: Sighting DetailsI was working night shift . I had taken a cigarette break in the carpark. We have been witnessing and filming what we nicknamed "Starballs" since late December 2012 .So much activity a person can see and film them daily ! I carry my camera with me because of this. around 12.50am on March 5 , a large glowing flashing craft becomes visible low on the horizon toward Mt. Field direction . slowly hovers , without any sound in my general direction.Craft appears to be made of six individual glowing , flashing orbs . 2 red 2 blue 2 green . Looked almost manmade because of this , but I was pretty sure this was something different.I have witnessed and filmed starballs stopping , hovering aimlessly , dipping swoooping and splitting apart into as many as five . have photos .Activity has intensified to the point where I am wondering what will be next .ship looks dark in the middle as though it is solid . I take 1 second time lapse photos of the object from one horizon to the other. Ship changes course through this hover .I am so excited at this point as I know I have something special .Ship moves out of view down valley in Easterly direction E .Spoke with ufo researcher several days later about it , after I plucked up enough courage . After he took my account he then informed me that they had another sighting reported that week , and went on to tell me that three glowing balls were sighted in Dodges Ferry by a man at 1 am. and that they headed past him in an easterly dir.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Object Shape: Boomerang, Cigar, Cylinder, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle, Unknown
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Virginia Beach
There were no other sightings in Virginia Beach on or around March 5th 2013
Summary: large brightly coloured craft moves towards camera . made of six large flashing balls of light .shape of object morphs into other craft .two other craft become visible .
